title: Profile - Leagues - See more stats
body:
what happened to see more stats option? 

cant click it for 2weeks or something...

replies.body:
What are leagues? 
 Do I get matched with people in my league against another league
Does it do something else or nothing much at all??
this has been making me really aggravted, i mean its been like this since the start of the season, really riot? you dont want us to see more stats?
